1.「グワッハハハ！ 怨霊退治の マネごとなんて| させられて ワケわかんねぇ……っ:
Gwahahahahaha! He's making a face like he|doesn't know what's going on, being made to do|the work of exterminating a vengeful spirit. I|
|don't understand.... That's right.

2.「なんせ オレもよく わかんねぇんだからな！| わかんなくとも けっこう 毛だら: I don't really know what's going on either! I|don't know, but I'm covered in fur. Candy Cat|is covered in stripes.

3.「だがよ 怨霊と踊り子に カンケーが| ねぇワケでもねぇ。じつは 大昔の| 踊り: But it's not that I don't care about the|grudge and the dancer. Actually, the dancers|long ago were different from those of today.

4.「なんでも 歌や踊りに 秘められた| 呪術的なチカラ…… それを利用して| 怨霊: It is said that their role was to use the|magical power hidden in their songs and dances|to ward off vengeful spirits.

5.「その昔 マジ強ぇ踊り子が 怨霊の親玉と| 大戦争やらかしたって 伝説まで残って:
There is even a legend about a really strong|dancer who had a big war with the master of|the grudge. So the legend of the dancer is a|
|legend of a really strong dancer.

7.「おぅ ラスタ！ いいとこに 帰ってきたな。| ちょうど <pc>が 例の怨霊ど: Oh, Rasta! You've come to the right place.|<pc> just got back from giving that|grudge-fucking thing a good beating.

8.「怨霊……ああ。この前 話したやつね。: Grudge...ah. The one I told you about the|other day.

9.「なんでぃ。反応うすいぜ？ ラスタ。| ……ははん。さては お前 コイツに| 追: Why? You're not responding well, are|you? Rasta. Huh? Are you worried that he's|going to overtake you?

10.「グワッハハハ！ まぁ 無理ねぇか。| コイツってば 古き伝説の マジ強踊り子す: Gwahahahaha! Well, it's no wonder. This guy|has the momentum to overtake even the Old|Dancer's Legend's seriously strong dancer!

11.「うんにゃ……。| もうとっくに 追いこしてたりしてな。| ふっふっふ……。: Unnya.......they may have already overtaken|him by now. Hmmm...

13.「いやあ これからは マジ強踊り子で| 爆売れ伝説の 時代だな！| マジ強 爆売: Well, from now on, it's the era of the legend|of the dancer who sells like hotcakes! The|legend of the strong dancer! Moo-hoo...

16.「あんな低級霊 浄化できて当たり前よ。| 古き伝説の踊り子の強さ……| 踊りの高: No wonder you can purify such a lowly spirit.|The strength of Old Dancer's Legend... the|height of dancing is nothing like that!

18.「ふっふっふ。オレとしたことが……。| ありゃ しばらく フキゲン伝説だな……。: Hmph. I'm a legend... I've been... a legend|for a while... but is there anything to be so|angry about?

19.「最近 やたら ピリピリしてんだよなぁ……。| まぁ 伝説に名を刻む 踊り子とし:
You've been a bit tense lately... well, if|you've come to realize that you're a dancer|who will go down in the legends... I'm happy|
|for you.

20.「つぅワケで <pc>の 成長を| お披露目すんのも また今度だな。: So I'll have to show off the growth of|<pc> another time.

21.「まぁ 安心しろよ。お前ほどの 逸材なら| ラスタの お眼鏡にかなうようになるの: Well, don't worry. If you're as good as you|think you are, it won't take Hat Hamwitch long|before you're in Rasta's good graces.

22.「次こそは ビシっと| 合方として 認めてもらおうぜ！: Next time, let's get him to recognize us as a|merged team!

23.「たいしたもんじゃねぇが 景気づけに| こんなもんを 用意させてもらったぜ。|: It's not much, but I've prepared this for you|to cheer you up. Keep up the good work.
